attributes.action: encourage the tourist industry in the UK to remove the "family ticket" discount at attractions and replace with more help and support for single parents and their children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It's a simple question - why do couples with children receive a discount on entry to visitor attractions across the UK, when they can best afford to pay the full cost.

To our way of thinking, single parents with children are usually financially worse off, and perhaps any economic benefit offered by tourist attractions in the UK should come their way.
